text: Anthony Oliver Scott (born July 10, 1966) is an American journalist and movie critic. He is the manager of all movie critics for The New York Times. His great-uncle is American actor Eli Wallach. Scott was born on July 10, 1966 in Northampton, Massachusetts. He is Jewish. Scott studied at the Classical High School, at Johns Hopkins University, and at Harvard University. He is married. They have two children. He now lives in Brooklyn, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * * A. O. Scott: New York Times articles * A. O. title: A. O. Scott
